meanings.definition: A colorless or slightly yellow, transparent, brittle protein formed by boiling the specially prepared skin, bones, and connective tissue of animals and used in food products, photographic materials, and glue.
meanings.sent1: The gelatin in the soup gave it a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating gelatin desserts on hot summer days.
meanings.sent3: The gelatin wobbled on the plate like a jiggly jellyfish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as firm as gelatin, unyielding to his attempts to cheer her up.
meanings.sent5: The gelatin shimmered under the sunlight, looking like a fragile crystal sculpture.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from gelatin, as a dessert or salad.
meanings.sent1: The kids eagerly devoured the colorful gelatin at the party.
meanings.sent2: She served a refreshing gelatin salad at the family picnic.
meanings.sent3: The gelatin dessert giggled as it wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent4: His words were like gelatin, sweet and pleasing to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The gelatin dessert sparkled like a gem, tempting everyone to take a bite.
